doc.after: In July 1739 he made his first contribution to the field of mathematics, pointing out the errors he had detected in L'analyse dÃ©montrÃ©e (published 1708 by Charles RenÃ© Reynaud) in a communication addressed to the AcadÃ©mie des Sciences.
